website_summaries.verdict: Unsurprisingly, Bulletproof's ghee is just the thing for your Bulletproof coffee.
pros: The ghee comes in a vibrant color with a light, creamy flavor
Aside from perking up coffee, this also goes well with sauteed veggies
cons: The grainy texture may bother some buyers

customer_reviews.title: This item arrived defective.  Not creamy, it’s oily with waxy beads.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived defective. Not creamy, it’s oily with waxy beads. Have ordered from Bulletproof in the past but I believe this vendor - Bulletproof 360 - is selling defective or knockoff product.
customer_reviews.author: @Gazi2a

customer_reviews.title: To oily
customer_reviews.text: Hard to rate this product fairly as I have used it over the past year and just loved it. I bought one a month ago and the top was a layer of oil in the jar, it was not solidified or "buttery" like in the past and the taste was not like the previous jars.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Very good product but after doing some research
customer_reviews.text: Very good product but after doing some research, have located Ghee online that is both grass-fed and offered at half the price. Grass Fed Ghee is Grass Fed Ghee, so the product mark up seems unnecessary. Search online for other Ghee products that fit your budget.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Da Ponte

customer_reviews.title: i like it but I have found
customer_reviews.text: i like it but I have found, grass fed organic ghee for 9 dollars, this is way over priced. by 200% for a name brand, that I am sure has no different ingredients because I have compared. and for all I know probably the same plant, just with a different label
customer_reviews.author: Victor G

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: This item makes my bullet proof coffee greasy and undrinkable ! I have used the grass fed butter from the grocery which makes a creamy delicious coffee unlike this product, and I am very unhappy to find it is not returnable. I will reconsider any future purchases planned for the seller!
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: I was worried because other people said Ghee tasted bad. Not this one
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because other people said Ghee tasted bad. Not this one. I use it for all my frying or baking needs. I love the taste, the high smoke point, and that I can keep it on the shelf!
customer_reviews.author: Sister Jackie Gail

customer_reviews.title: Ghee arrived spoiled - discovered after top was man-handled off.
customer_reviews.text: Ghee arrived with rest of order (this was our second order.) In the first order the ghee was smooth, waxy with a finish like butter. This time we couldn't open the jar - once the top was man-handled, we were surprised to see the lack of texture and general badness of the product within.... I suspect the product was off-gassing thereby "sealing" the jar lid even tighter. We are switching to Kerrygold silver. Would be nice if we could get some sort of credit toward future purchases from Bulletproof - we're already up to 200.00 + for this month. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Saur

customer_reviews.title: Not the same consistency as Bulletproof.com
customer_reviews.text: After ordering this product on Amazon twice I decided to see if there was any difference in this product if I ordered directly from Bulletproof.com, and there was a big difference. The order from the website was a much better consistency (creamy and buttery) not like the orders I received on Amazon which were lumpy and greasy. I will be ordering directly from Bulletproof.com going forward so I know what I am getting is the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: ZSnow

customer_reviews.title: False advertisment
customer_reviews.text: It states it is gluten-free and when you receive it you find it is manufactured in a factory with wheat products. This statement does not appear in any of the advertisement pictures. They were rude when I contacted them. Neither Amazon nor Bulletproof will stand by this product. So I am out the money and it seems I can't even give it away!.
customer_reviews.author: Holly C

customer_reviews.title: Jar lid is impossible to open
customer_reviews.text: I find it impossible to open this jar. I have tried everything to lossen it and the size (circumference) of the jar makes it very difficult to grip. I'm going back to the Trader Joe's Ghee, since this was a waste of money given the huge frustration trying to pry it open each morning and having to give up enjoying it in my coffee.
customer_reviews.author: PJB

customer_reviews.title: Ghee-reaaaat stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! It's a mainstay of my ketogenic diet/lifestyle! Incredibly tasty on veggies, in coffee, etc. Thank you for this lovely product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?? The flavor is incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, I can't believe I waited so long to try ghee. A friend recommended it years ago, and I thought nothing was wrong with my butter, so why bother. But on the keto diet, I've been adding a lot of the Bulletproof items (I also love the brain octane oil). This ghee is also wonderful because it's not solid like butter sticks, so I can always spread it, put it in the pan easily, or add to bulletproof coffee :) Flavor is truly incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Zalla Otten

customer_reviews.title: On probation
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what to make of it yet. Need time. We are health nuts, e.g., juicers, veg and grass-fed-meat and butter only. Was ill after a spoonful of this product. Perhaps you must start small. It claims it does not need refrigeration. I'm going to err on the side of caution and refrigerate. Could be a coincidence that I got a stomach bacterial problem shortly after eating Ghee. The verdict is still out.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Salas

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY and it turns out
customer_reviews.text: The butter had black mold in the jar! NOT HAPPY and it turns out, it says it is not eligible for a return! This was expensive and I am seriously not happy, did I mention that?
customer_reviews.author: Monica Lee-henell

customer_reviews.title: Kick a** mornings.
customer_reviews.text: I have read a lot of David Asprey's material and use some of his products and other supplements of the same type. Since I have been doing so, my mornings start off with a bang and last all day. I'm not sure exactly which product does it, but this butter, and his Bullet Proof coffee are in the mix. I'm on fire, in a good way, and I suspect it has a lot to do with the Bulletproof products.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bode

customer_reviews.title: Watery and inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Ordered product direct before with no issue, but a couple including my most recent on Amazon came in mostly liquid form and will not reharden at room temperature and the consistency is terrible due to this. It is like watery pudding and nothing like any normal Ghee I have gotten from any other source.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tait

customer_reviews.title: Good taste buts melts in transit.
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste of Bulletproof Ghee over other brands but I’m not sure I’ll be having this shipped anymore. My latest delivery saw some of the ghee melt and seep through onto the packaging. In my pictures, you can see the oil marks on the box and in between the front plastic seal and lid. UPDATE: Bulletproof customer care provided speedy remediation of my issue. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: YK

customer_reviews.title: This is the best cup of coffee that I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would last me for a long time since I (Foolishly) thought that I would be the only one drinking one cup a day. Now that my husband has found it, I will have to be doubling my orders soon. This is the best coffee product that I have ever had in my life! Thank you so much for having it on Prime, which of course has everything but the BulletProof coffee wins over all of the other products, hands down!! I know that I keep thanking you for this but what can I say? It is absolutely the best! Janice Brady
customer_reviews.author: janice brady

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff or terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst ghee I have ever had. Is liquid/waxy at room temp. Never seen ghee do that before. Smells slightly rancid.
customer_reviews.author: S & W Diesel Repair LLC

customer_reviews.title: First of all, the taste is very enjoyable. ...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the taste is very enjoyable. Secondly, if you are looking for something to help with you never ending hunger feeling, this has really helped me. I am talking about : Bulletproof Original coffee pods with Bulletproof Ghee and Bulletproof Octane Oil
customer_reviews.author: derphi912

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fair price
customer_reviews.text: This ghee is probably the best out of the 4 types of ghee I’ve tried as far as flavor. It is not the best price though. It’s a little more than organic valley I can get local. And I’ve found other organic valley on amazon for the best price. This is a high quality product and you get what you pay for. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Suing

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS MY SECOND ORDER...
customer_reviews.text: AND I EXPECTED IT TO BE THE SAME AS FIRST. THE FLAVOR IS THE SAME, GOOD, BUT THE TEXTURE IS DIFFERENT. FIRST JAR WAS SMOOTH, THIS ONE IS SORT OF GRITTY. VERY STRANGE. I'LL KEEP IT AS I CAN COOK WITH IT FINE..BUT ON A MUFFIN IT FEELS DIFFERENT.
customer_reviews.author: bakerstreet

customer_reviews.title: Thicker/Richer Coffee: Bonus Lip Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make bullet-proof coffee and can't drink coffee without it. It is firm in the colder months, but will melt like coconut oil in the summer time. Adding this to coffee gives the coffee a depth and a very faint buttery (without the salt) taste. I like how it moisturizes my lips afterwards 💋. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aly S

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use this in hot beverages and it has a very good flavor. I see that some folks have complained about the grainy texture in some jars, but since I’m melting it I have had no problems with that. My only problem was with the jar. It’s very difficult to get open. I thought it was just the initial time, but subsequent uses were just as problematic. I solved this by emptying the jar into one of my clean canning jars; problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: pamela dipzinski

customer_reviews.title: Ghee-licious in Coffee and on Broccoli
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality ghee. There is always a shortage. That's how good it is. It smells amazing, like most ghee, but Bulletproof has a nuttier divine scent. Be careful of using too much at once. It smells better than it tastes, and your belly may hurt like Dhalsim from Street Fighter poked you in the solar plexus. The body has a hard time with too much fat at once. Just like most chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Castle

customer_reviews.title: Great brand, just not that great of ghee! Buy 4th and Heart instead (chepaer too!)
customer_reviews.text: Well, this ghee is not terrible, but I had an EXTREMELY hard time opening up the jar. The ghee gets in the grooves of the lid and then it gets sealed like glue. Really hard to open the jar. And the ghee inside is clumpy and not uniform. I like 4th and Heart ghee better, their product is smooth and easy to spread. I love Bulletproof, but this is overpriced and the jar needs some work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is time to be skeptical of junk science.
customer_reviews.text: In this time of Covid-19, I have become much more discerning about the difference between proven medicine and spurious advertising claims. This is ghee, people. Butter. It will not make you healthier, smarter, or more energetic. (Unless you were starving.). Save your $22. Btw, if you love grass fed butter it’s like $3/lb at the supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: Lover of Learning

customer_reviews.title: Short shelf life
customer_reviews.text: Good product but more expensive than other products in the same category. Also I was surprised that the lip showed the "Best By Date" of 01/21/2018 when I purchased it in early January of 2018. Why the short shelf life ?
customer_reviews.author: D. Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Works for me. Combined with brain octane I lost ...
customer_reviews.text: Works for me. Combined with brain octane I lost those last 9 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but pricey
customer_reviews.text: While the product tastes delicious, it does not have "about 29" servings in it. I've used an actual tablespoon measure, with a knife to scrape the top flat. I've used less than a tablespoon 15 times. And I've got maybe 3 tablespoons left, if I scrape every last bit out. 18 servings for over 23 bucks is a bit steep.
customer_reviews.author: Dawne Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Poor Instance of an otherwise good product
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this from the Bulletproof site and really enjoy that and would give that 5 stars. But the quality of the product from Amazon was very different. The Ghee has “separated” and has an oil layer and curd layer. From the vendor it’s homogeneous and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Bluefishlover

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line
customer_reviews.text: I use Ghee to mix with my coffee with MCT8. You want the best and BulletProof makes the best stuff. You don't need much in your coffee, is price spreads along many cups. Great product, and I'll buy it again And there is strange aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hayat

customer_reviews.title: Different properties than other batches/BP product
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered a lot of BP ghee from the bulletproof website, and I've also purchased large jars from other high quality brands. This particular batch did not stay solid on our counter like all the other jars have done. It became too liquidy and looked mildly separated from the start.
customer_reviews.author: ewell

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel a little, little, little less hungry in the morning
customer_reviews.text: Use the whole container. Now I am using no ghee, to see if I can notice a difference and i think I can. I am a little, little, little less hungry when I take 1 TBSP of ghee in the morning with 1 TBSP of Brain octane oil, 1 TBSP of beauty boost, and 1-2 TBSP of Collagen protein powder. I only take my supplements as needed. If I am working 12+ hour days, working out 6-7 days a week, and only sleeping 6 hours a day. I take my supplements. If I am sleeping in, relaxing, shopping, or only working 8 hours a day, I DON’T take my supplements. Supplements are expensive, stretch them out over time.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several brands of ghee. This one is so-so. Bulletproof products are touted as being great but I have not tried one from this company that's a keeper. Way overpriced. Recommend 4th & Heart.
customer_reviews.author: pjrd

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Ghee
customer_reviews.text: Best Ghee I've tried, love the bulletproof brand. High quality everything. This ghee tastes awesome and is easily spreadable as most ghee's I've found are quite tough without warming first, sort of like butter out of the fridge... this one great for cooking, morning coffee (easily dissolvable), or over bread
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Sharrock

customer_reviews.title: Funky liquid
customer_reviews.text: This is the 6th jar I bought of this product and typically love it. This jar came with a gritty buttery liquid that has a funky smell. The shrink wrap also had a black hair shrunk wrapped to the jar. Not sure what happened to quality control but this seller won’t take a return. Not very happy with product or brand at this point
customer_reviews.author: Greg Abel

customer_reviews.title: Best ghee on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best Ghee on the market. Its smooth, rich and has great flavor. This is the only ghee I will put in my coffee knowing it's the best quality. BP only delivers high quality products. Well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Avlisjacire1

customer_reviews.title: Melts in shipment and gets grainy.
customer_reviews.text: Product had obviously melted at least once before I received it. It was clumped on the side of the jar instead of nicely in the bottom as it has in previous orders. Product was grainy and didn’t taste as good as in the past. Mentioned this to them in an email. They said it was normal. I’ll order a different brand going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Remer

customer_reviews.title: Prefer to use it as a cooking fat instead of BPC
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the intent of using it in my bullet proof coffee at work. It gets the job done but i think I prefer using the Kerry Gold. I've used this a couple of times as a cooking fat and am pleased with the quality. The price is a little bit on the high side but I have no issues with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip S.

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived spoiled and is not allowed for a return. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Bartholomina

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised how much I liked bulletproof coffee
customer_reviews.text: I would never have put butter and coconut oil in coffee but it’s all I drink now. I like it best if I put it in the blender. It comes out looking like and tastes a lot like creamy coffee with no sugar. Give me lots of energy all day. Don’t drink it at night it keeps me awake till midnight.
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Usually good product, sometimes a dud can come
customer_reviews.text: I usually order this ghee and I love it. This order was watery and of strange consistency. The other ghee I keep on hand remains firm, so it is not a reaction to temperature. I’d rather return this item as hope that a new order is similar consistency as the last two jars I’ve ordered in the past six weeks.
customer_reviews.author: def trek

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with Ghee!
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried Ghee until this product. I must say it is quite amazing! I switched over from grass fed butter to Ghee and it makes all of my food taste so good. I keep telling all of my friends to jump on the Ghee bandwagon. This is probably my fourth jar! I love the Bulletproof brand and will continue to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tara Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Have this every morning
customer_reviews.text: This with the Bullet proof coffee is so good I only need one cup in the morning to get me started. tastes great. no issues having on an empty stomach. Ill even drink on weekends if I have no plans to do anything during the day. Helps with interment fasting. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: sean stephens

customer_reviews.title: expensive but.......truly worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several grassfed Ghee products now and have come back to Bulletproof Ghee. Really the best tasting Ghee. I am now a believer and constant user.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Grainy in appearance, not very appetizing
customer_reviews.text: The product tastes good but the grainy appearance is very unappetizing. Also, it is basically liquid and even after refrigeration and trying again, it still goes to a liquid state. Not happy with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L Ballinger

customer_reviews.title: Rancid
customer_reviews.text: I have used this many times but my last shipment it was watery and although I know ghee can be that way, I was having stomach upset and feel that it was rancid/old.
customer_reviews.author: Jen L.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I did not have time to read the reviews or look at the other available brands. When I had the time I looked at the reviews and the price I have paid. It is overrated and highly priced, nearly double the price of similar ghees. I felt cheated when I realized that I could have got the same for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This particular jar has quite a bit of crystallized bits in it. The flavor is still decent, but it is difficult to scoop out and measure correctly
customer_reviews.author: Randy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Added to my coffee to take the place of cream. Taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra hughes

customer_reviews.title: Tampered?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why, but my ghee appears used after immediately opening a unused sealed jar. Anyone else experience this? I'm very leary to use it. Item had a non return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied/ how do I get Refunded?
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with the last two attempts to order this product. Had ordered dozen times in past and never had this problem. Is this even good to use?? This is usually a solid spreadable butter and it’s runny and separated.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Rogosienski

customer_reviews.title: Much better than regular butter for bullet proof coffee.
customer_reviews.text: While you probably don't need to use their brand, this stuff is great. Definitely recommend over regular butter. I use it along with their Brain Octane oil in the morning. Sometimes I make it and mix with a pour over. Other times I use the Four Sigmatic Mushroom Coffee (also recommend).
customer_reviews.author: Chad A. Lauterbach

customer_reviews.title: Great texture, smooth and creamy; no added salt!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my coffee every morning!! Love it!! Just wish it stated on the jar if it needs to be refrigerated or not. I leave mine out so it melts quickly, but my home is set cool....
customer_reviews.author: JMPav

customer_reviews.title: Pleased customer
customer_reviews.text: Really love that there is a better and healthier way of eating. I heard about Ghee from friends, and I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Williams

customer_reviews.title: Spendy
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I wonder if the big bubble left by filling the jar decreases the amount you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on bread, vegetables, and my steak. Good flavor!
customer_reviews.author: mark brock

customer_reviews.title: OK Ghee.
customer_reviews.text: 1/2 stays melted most of them time and the other half stays pretty solid - not sure why. Overall, it's an OK ghee. I prefer the one I got from Sprouts.
customer_reviews.author: Emme D.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Ghee!
customer_reviews.text: This the best ghee I’ve tried, and I’ve tried many other organic and grass-fed cow ghee products. Many of the others I threw away due to their horrible flavor. This ghee tastes amazing, especially under almond butter or by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Brian2012

customer_reviews.title: Pursue zero bullshitology
customer_reviews.text: I love the brand and the work Dave has done to create a huge drive behind the concept. The podcast is one of the best and the Game Changers book is straight to the point! The only thing I’d question is that you should pursue a zero bullshitology theory, where your true actions are bigger than your speech. To do that you should evolve deeper into how the products are made. The butter, the coffee, for instance, how you prove they don’t use chemicals, pesticides, herbicides, etc. you have to control these! Go to the farms, create solutions!
customer_reviews.author: Ernani Judice

customer_reviews.title: Great Ghee!
customer_reviews.text: Have tried many, this one is exactly what I want, ghee. Not flavored, doesnt smell or taste like popcorn, flowers or anything else, just Ghee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ghee!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this grass-fed ghee. You can taste the difference! I have used it on toast, for baking cookies, and for frying eggs. Excellent. Stores nicely in the glass jar provided.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn I Bond

customer_reviews.title: There is a lot of Ghee out there on the ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of Ghee out there on the market, but BulletProof is to be trusted. Don't hesitate to purchase any BulletProof product.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Carrafiello Shimp

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not very special. If you are not allergic to butter then might as well use grass fed butter like kerrygold
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Ru

customer_reviews.title: Grainy and oily
customer_reviews.text: Terrible consistency; not creamy and smooth as would be expected from ghee. The product is separated, grainy and oily. Not even sure if it's safe to consume. Not able to return. Definitely won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Hate to post a bad review, but this butter is rancid and not returnable.
customer_reviews.text: I hate to write a bad review since I am enjoying reading Dave Asprey’s book Head Strong and this is his product, but this butter tastes rancid and apparently I cannot return it!
customer_reviews.author: Pollyanna Austin

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this in my coffee (along with Brain Octane Oil) almost every day for a couple years now. Don't know how I ever got along without it! Thank you Dave Asprey for being awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Green

customer_reviews.title: I've tried several Ghee products but...
customer_reviews.text: This ghee is exactly as advertised. I find it gives me energy all day and the flavor is great with bullet proof coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the taste of ghee with food items but it ...
customer_reviews.text: The ghee in coffee is delicious. However I've tried making ice coffee with it many times and the only time it works well is when you heat the ghee first. I like the taste of ghee with food items but it does taste a little different than butter. I've been on the diet 2 weeks and have lost 2 lbs. While it may not seem like a lot, this diet has helped me break my plateau while eating delicious food I already like. My energy is also often higher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: its fine...not bad, the flavor is ok. its a little pricey for what it is. I much prefer the Ancient Organics Ghee....way better flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect packaging! Easy to add to everything! Grass fed ghee-truly makes the difference!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Hi not happy with one broken out of 2 I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Hi not happy with one broken out of 2 I ordered, may I please get a replacement sent to me? Note that the box and AZ box was not damaged. Thx John L (BTW - Love the energy & taste)
customer_reviews.author: John LeDuc

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking
customer_reviews.text: I have replaced most of my cooking oils with the ghee. It doesn't have an overwhelming taste, so you taste the food & not the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Avalanche

customer_reviews.title: First time having ghee.
customer_reviews.text: I realize it's not my thing. The quality and value appear fine, however, it doesn't suit my taste. I will give it another try or most likely give it away to a friend who absolutely loves this.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M

customer_reviews.title: Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I use it to make my bullet proof coffee. First ime I tried it is when I went to visit my daughter. Love the coffee so when I got home I had to order it cause the coffee was great
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate and Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate reading, look for something else if you want something solid and precise. Don't waste your money on this!
customer_reviews.author: M&U

customer_reviews.title: Better than butter
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I think it is a bit pricy, and the consistency is just a little bit thin. BUT, this one has the very best, most intense butter flavor by FAR over other brands I’ve tried—even better than butter. So, I stick with this one.
customer_reviews.author: MJR

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money you can buy ghee butter in any grocery store
customer_reviews.author: Janet Leavesley

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy!
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste and the fact that it's organic makes me at peace. I use it in my soups and on my sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer of Ghee...
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. Love the fact that it doesn't have to be refrigerated unlike other products (which, of course, only hardens them). Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Tews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this and will reorder. I know this is like a medical claim. So, I will say up front I have no medical back ground. I had a Stroke 6 years ago and survived ...I was left , still in pretty good shape . Left side has very little movement. But I had suffered often with what I called Brain Fuzz and I started using this with the Octane oil in my morning coffee and it is gone unless I run out. So I am a Beliver and try to stay ahead on my order😊
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Love Bulletproof!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered Bulletproof products for several years and they are awesome. They certainly have THE best coffee! I'd purchased the Ghee from them in the past and love it. I made the mistake of trying something that was available locally and it was tasteless. Learned my lesson!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie O

customer_reviews.title: Slight chemical taste
customer_reviews.text: Not the best ghee I’ve purchased. It has a slight chemical taste to it. Won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rob J

customer_reviews.title: Just as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Packaged perfectly and delivered in the window it was promised. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: rwills

customer_reviews.title: The best ghee for coffee
customer_reviews.text: I use this ghee in my coffee everyday. It keeps me going until after walking my round of golf. Tastes great and I trust Bulletproof for the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alan C

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but priced too high IMO
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is worth 5 stars...the taste and everything is great. However, I think it costs WAY too much, and end up going with other brands now.
customer_reviews.author: Amy in OK

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: The taste is great! It lasted a good while and I’m definitely purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hodge

customer_reviews.title: A BIG NO
customer_reviews.text: This was flavorless for the most part, and gritty. Ick. For $22, I'll buy several cases of REAL, creamy, butter thanks.
customer_reviews.author: DWR

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this!! On my 3rd jar!!!! Delicious, nutritious, and so good for your digestive system and your beautiful Heart💗
customer_reviews.author: barn yard mamma

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste. It is soft and creamy and easy to spread. I use it in my coffee instead of creamer. Delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: *****Grainy and Runny Bulletproof Grass-Fed Ghee Butter*****
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered this product. The first time the quality was excellent, this second time all 4 jars were runny and grainy in texture with an off taste! The product is not returnable thru Amazon so we are out over $100!! I will not purchase this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Alverson

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: THIS VERY GOOD PRODUCT FOR YOUR HEALTH, MY KIDS LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: yoy

customer_reviews.title: The best I've tried, so far
customer_reviews.text: Cost more than most Ghee's, but it is superior to others I have tried. Bulletproof is an excellent company to work with and purchase from.
customer_reviews.author: Heater

customer_reviews.title: Not quite right!
customer_reviews.text: Gross. I’ve purchased other high quality ghee products and this is the most expensive and was VERY poor quality. Also to make matters worse it says it is not eligible for return. Ugh what a waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Larsen

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: We are glad to have found this product as it gives us an alternative to olive oil. This is a good fat for people to eat as well.
customer_reviews.author: G. Devader

customer_reviews.title: Great spread!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best Gee I ever had, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: WebGuy

customer_reviews.title: Good in coffee
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this in his coffee. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Using this instead of butter/oil. Better for you. No issues with it except it goes so quickly and more costly than the butter/oil.
customer_reviews.author: katherine michele thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, adds body and taste to my morning coffee
customer_reviews.text: I put it in coffee so spreadibilty isn’t an issue Would be nice to have some recipes for it
customer_reviews.author: T. Richmond

product_meta.title: Bulletproof Ghee, Clarified Butter Fat from Grass Fed Cows, Keto and Paleo Friendly, Gluten-Free, 13.5 Ounces
feature_bullets: CLARIFIED BUTTERFAT: Bulletproof Ghee is produced by slowly heating grass-fed butter over an open flame to remove the moisture and milk solids; this process removes nearly all casein and lactose

DELICIOUS BUTTERY TASTE: A natural rich and buttery flavor that enhances a wide variety of foods and beverages; a great pantry staple, and it's high in omega-3, CLA, beta-carotene, Vitamin A, Vitamin K, Vitamin D, Vitamin E
AS VERSATILE AS IT IS DELICIOUS: Add to Bulletproof coffee or try it drizzled over any food to upgrade your meal and power your day
QUALITY FAT WITH NO UNWANTED EXTRAS: Naturally sugar free, gluten free and non-GMO; no added colors, dyes, flavor enhancers, or preservatives
IDEAL FOR COOKING: A high smoke point of 485°F makes it great for most cooking applications: cook, roast, bake, spread, drizzle, sauté, rub, glaze
